title: Pixel 4a 5G Speakerphone sometimes Won't Work until phone restarted
content:
I'm now on my 2nd Pixel 4a 5G, and the speakerphone has again become flaky.
The problem is that on some calls the speakerphone button doesn't workâ€”
the phone remains in non-speakerphone mode.
Restarting the phone usually (but not always) solves the problem for a period of time.
A friend also on her 2nd Pixel 4a 5G has the same problem.
It's almost certainly a software bug, so another replacement isn't likely to help.
But Google Support has nothing else to suggest.
I've followed the Nexus-Pixel from the original Nexus One,
but problems with the Pixel 4a 5G may finally drive me away.
I think it no coincidence that the trade press is reporting a decline in Pixel loyalty.
